author: mmusich
body:
fixes https://github.com/cms-AlCaDB/AlCaTools/issues/26

#### PR description:

Modernize `SiStripDetInfoFileWriter`:
   * merge headers with plugin implementation
   * transformed legacy `EDAnalyzer`s into `edm::one::EDAnalyzer`s

#### PR validation:

It compiles.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
title: modernize `SiStripDetInfoFileWriter`
